name: Juchy Party
description:
Juchy Party

Its a simple local multiplayer jumping game (single player only available for mobile users). Players must avoid enemies by jumping over. There is also top 10 list for best teams (or player):

Juchy Party TOP 10

Controls (Jump button)

  • Player 1 = Up arrow / tap touchscreen
  • Player 2 = W
  • Player 3 = Y
  • Player 4 = P

There is no way for multiplayer with one touchscreen... so mobile users have only single player mode.
